textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY STF + LOOP" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY STF + LOOP" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_STF_LOOP
Type: Flow
Version: 11
Status: Active
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY STF + LOOP
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
